plot: Tamra tries to convince Vicki that her friendship with Gretchen won't overshadow their bond, while Alexis and Heather meet for a doomed lunch to try and work out their differences. Vicki and her daughter Briana discuss Vicki's new boyfriend, and Briana tells her mother of an upcoming surgery. Meanwhile, Slade is trying out a new career -- comedy -- and against Gretchen's wishes, his routine is filled with Housewife-insulting jokes. How will Gretchen react when Slade ridicules her friends in public?—Anonymous
